cooldown.description: This command is on cooldown. You can use it again in **{cooldown_time_left} seconds**.

missing_bot_permissions.description:
It seems like I don't have the required permissions to execute this command.

If this issue keeps occurring, make sure to re-invite me to your server through **[this link]({link_main})**.

cannot_talk.description:
It seems like I don't have the required permissions to send messages in this channel.

Some minigame commands require me to be able to fully see and send messages in the channel in order for them to work.

**{informative} If you are a server administrator, make sure to give me `VIEW_CHANNEL` & `SEND_MESSAGES` permissions in this channel.**
